answers.author: Phillip Moore
answers.text:
We had that type but it produced few results.  THe most success program was when I invited 8-10 employees to have lunch with me.  I made sure no two employees were from the same department/division.  i was amazed at how serious the employees took the exercise and the saving and productivity improvement that resulted from the effort.  I am from a small city so was able to do this with all our employees.  I reported all the suggestions to the City Commission.  When I implemented an idea, I generally gave employees credit unless I knew it would be unpopular with the public.

author: James May
text:
I am interested in receiving information on any public organization employee suggestion programs, particularly the types and amounts of awards granted to employees for implemented suggestions.  I am also interested in whether any of you have suggestion programs that the public can participate in.  Please feel free to send any information to me at james.may@phoenix.gov.  I have included the guidelines for Phoenix's program for your information.
Thank you!
James May
Deputy HR Director
City of Phoenix, Arizona
602-262-6401
title: Employee Suggestion Programs
